MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH15 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:40pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:44pm on Saturday, 03 April 2021
